Text.Page:
The Kazuur Syndicate is trying to move the slavesâ€”they must know we're on to them.

Take out the guards at Sandbar Beach. If a ship pulls up and sees a bunch of {@LinkCreature:12#14#gula trafficker} corpses, they won't risk moving the slaves.

Plus, more dead slavers is an inherently good thing, right?

One piece of the puzzle at a time, .

It's like we're dismantling a jigsaw puzzle. Every part of the puzzle we remove makes the rest look more wrecked and chaotic.

And eventually the whole thing falls apart. Hah!
